scripts.beam:codex: bun run --cwd cli build && node cli/dist/bin.js --session codex
scripts.test: bun run test:mocked && bun run test:cli
scripts.lint:all: bun run --cwd cli lint && bun run --cwd packages/shared lint && bun run --cwd packages/terminal lint && bun run --cwd packages/tunnel lint && bun run --cwd packages/ui lint
scripts.typecheck:all: bun run --cwd cli typecheck && bun run --cwd packages/shared typecheck && bun run --cwd packages/terminal typecheck && bun run --cwd packages/tunnel typecheck && bun run --cwd packages/ui typecheck
